data.convo: Good afternoon , it's nice to see you again . Have you decided to go ahead and try for the Fixed Asset Loan ? I'm going to need some more info first . I was wondering about the repayments . How long would I have to pay back the loan ? That depends . Our repayment plans go from 1 year to 10 years . The Fixed Asset Loan is a long-term loan , you see . The loan can be paid in either monthly or quarterly instalments , to suit your needs . And how much is payable in each instalment ? You will need to pay part of the principle sum and part of the interest due . Well , as far as I can see , the advantages outweigh the disadvantages . You've sold me ! I'd like to go ahead .
